Caption: Prof. Lt. G. V. N. Rayudu receives Union Minister for Education Mr. M. C. Chagla, who was the chief guest at the Second Convocation
Description: Prof. Lt. G. V. N. Rayudu was a faculty member of the Mechanical Engineering Department. To Mr. Chaglaâ€™s left is Commodore Rabinder Nath Batra (white uniform), tentatively identified by Mr. Srinivasa Gopal. Batra is said to have been a Naval Officer in Charge, posted in Chennai at the time.
